comments.body: You may want to use `BEFORE` keyword when adding `${CLANG_INCLUDE_DIRS}`.

I am not sure I get your idea. I need `CLANG_INCLUDE_DIRS` to show up before `LLVM_INCLUDE_DIRS`. IIUC, if I want to use `BEFORE` I will have to have at least two lines. Can you paste a code snippet here and I'll be happy to use it.

@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@# headers from our builtin clang. That's an issue when we are building with bultin_llvm=Off
